page.title: 18LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: On 11th June 1985 the school had a visitor Mr. Andy Bigg from Vancouver, Canada. He had lived in Wrestlingworth as a child. The schools Admissions Register dated his entry as 1923. Mr. Bigg's father had been the Daily Mail representative for Bedfordshire, Camridgeshire and Hertfordshire. The family had built a bungalow at Water End and had owned one of the first cars in Wrestlingworth. In time Mr. Bigg had emigrated to Canada, where he had become a successful journalist and had owned his own newspaper near Vancouver. He thought the village had changed very little and left us for a search for any fellow school mates who were still around.
